website_summaries.verdict: From a respected maker of foot care products, this three-pack of aerosol spray is strong and effective.
pros: Two-sided sprayer reaches the front and back of your shoes simultaneously
Suitable for multiple materials including leather and suede
cons: There is a bit of a learning curve when it comes to figuring out the two-sided sprayer

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness! My boyfriends feet are horrible when he wears his work boots! This stuff smells strong, but it’s not too much of an overload so it’s tolerable to deal with. Anything smells better than the inside of those boots! As soon as it’s sprayed inside of them, it takes less than a minute for the smell to disappear. Highly, highly, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Good foot odor spay for shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My running shoes smell so I purchased these. Very easy to use and they really do cut down on the odor not just mask it. I have to use it only once a week or so, so it seems to work for a long enough amount of time. Happy with it and will certainly buy more when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product to keep your shoes from smelling like death though keep your face away from the shoes and the aerosol when you use it as the aerosol smell is quite strong. I would wish that the aerosol is only one side as to keep the product more longer lasting since I find it pointless to have it spray on the heel side as the back spray of the front can cover it.
customer_reviews.author: cian ai

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This product works great and is easy to use .. no longer do o smell my sons stinky feet after he gets off a long day at the restaurant .. we keep this right next to wear he takes his shoes off .. he sprays each shoe once every day and it works .. no more stink .. I don’t smell the sweetness some reviewers mentioned but maybe just so glad no more terrible foot smell I’ll take any smell over that
customer_reviews.author: Su

customer_reviews.title: Sweet scent. Not in a good way
customer_reviews.text: Dispenser is great, but the scent is a little sweet. Not ideal for shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Igor Kobyzev

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the stink
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever!! My shoes smell so bad they stink up the whole front room. This helps so much! I use it about once a week. When used as directed 1 can lasted me about 2 months. My feet still smell at the end of a long day at work but it's nothing compared to before, and my shoes are no longer detectable from 30 feet away! I also paired this with charcoal shoe inserts but I think this is the main miracle worker in my case. I think the people that say the scent is overpowering either sprayed a little too much or they don't truly have smelly feet. 🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Tara P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, delivered promptly
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent version of the KIWI Deodorizer. Works extremely well just like the original. Amazon delivery was excellent too.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Help

customer_reviews.title: Simple effective shoe deodorizer
customer_reviews.text: Open the cap, put in shoe, push down. Can it get any easier? Scent is great and have noticed there's less smell coming from the shoe rack.
customer_reviews.author: Frank J. Herron

customer_reviews.title: Great scent
customer_reviews.text: Much better scent then others i have tried for my running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Hrlaw50

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves using these show deodorizers. For which I am glad because, you know, stinky athletic shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Sue

customer_reviews.title: Quality stuff, best price per unit and will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Ideal for everyday use. I'm in sales and my dress shoes smell at the end of the day. This helps deodorizer and freshen them up
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: The aroma is not persistent enough
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this shoe deodorant, but it wasn’t durable enough. The smell lasts for a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Evgenia

customer_reviews.title: No more stinky shoes
customer_reviews.text: I’m a nurse and wow would my shoes smell after a 12-13 hour shift. When I started using this spray regularly, no more stinky shoes! I love this spray and use it religiously. Works wonders.
customer_reviews.author: Breeanna C.

customer_reviews.title: Odor Eater
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Works excellent for hard working mens shoes. Easy to use twist bottom. Highly suggest this for tough odors!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria C.

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: This really worked. We had tried many other ways to rid a pair of shoes of a bad smell. This was the last resort before we threw away a perfectly good pair of shoes. It worked and we saved the shoes!!
customer_reviews.author: Ian S Williams

customer_reviews.title: Get these!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and helps reduce shoe stench drastically.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Smelly shoes? You need this.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and works! Makes stinky shoes smell better!!!
customer_reviews.author: jmill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Don’t hold for too long or your hands will get wet.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: The cans are kinda small and don't go a long way, but this spray keeps my shoes smelling NICE.
customer_reviews.author: tyler

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME..
customer_reviews.text: ...for sweaty tennis shoes...enjoy using it and it helps immensely.
customer_reviews.author: Nedlydonowrong

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This shoe deodorizer works well. I use it for my golf shoes when they get moist and it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and it works!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very effective for deodorizing my shoes and boots.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, effective, but what are the ingredients?
customer_reviews.text: I found this very effective on some shoes I use for gardening that was so bad I had given up hope for them and kept them outside. They work very well at neutralizing the odor and making them tolerable. I only have one problem, and that's why it's a 4 and not a 5. What is in it? For the ingredients, it just lists some chemical formulas used in their proprietary mix. I have no idea what's in this. I would rather know what it is that I'm spraying on the inside of my shoes where my feet will sit for long lengths of time. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Thraddash

customer_reviews.title: This Does Keep Your Shoes Odor Free
customer_reviews.text: I used to use baby powder with talc inside my shoes, to keep them odor free, but since we now know that baby powder with talc can cause cancer, I no longer use it. I like that this Kiwi Fresh Shoe Deordorizer comes in a 3 Pack. I sprayed One Aerosol Spray Canister into 4 pairs of women's slippers, and 3 pairs of women's sneakers, and there seems to be a little left when I shake it, so I would say that One Aerosol Spray Canister can deodorize 6-8 pairs of shoes, give or take, given the size of shoe. The scent is a powdery scent. Make sure that you read and understand the directions, before using.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lafferman

customer_reviews.title: Work well and smells great
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and it smells great! It freshens up shoes within seconds. The scent is very pleasant and refreshes not only the shoes but the whole area the shoe is located. Works great in most footwear especially sneakers and boots. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tracybeth

customer_reviews.title: Solves the odor issue
customer_reviews.text: I tend to wear the same pair of work boots every shift. (I actually have two sets of work boots, but I prefer one set over the other.) I am using this sprayer once a week and it really does a good job of "freshening" the boots. The problem with most malodorous footwear, I have come to understand, is that they are worn too often without enough time in-between wearings to "dry out," or to let the bacteria inside them die away. This spray helps with that issue by thoroughly deodorizing the shoe or boot from toe to heel. The price isn't bad for what your get, either. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell Edison

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Shoe Deodorizer
customer_reviews.text: This design is perfect! I have been using deodorizing sprays for my shoes for a long time but they were powdery and only got into some, not all of the areas and of course boots were kinda difficult to maneuver. But this design solves all those problems. Just plant at the floor of the shoe, press down and the entire shoe is effortlessly deodorized. Easy, peasy. The scent takes a bit of getting used to - not my favorite. But 100% better than smelling like stinky sweat. I used it on all my running shoes, my hiking shoes, my rows of rubber boots - all deodorized in a flash.
customer_reviews.author: CountessMC

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and it works
customer_reviews.text: I like this because it's so simple to use. Just put it in the shoe and press down. This is so much easier than using the powder form we've been using. The powder can start to make a mess inside the shoes and then also, if we use too much it's on our socks and then we walk powder around the house when we take our shoes off. I like that I don't even have to pick up the shoes to use this. Just a quick spray and it's done. The scent is powdery and light and if I have our shoes lined up, I can get them all sprayed in just a matter of seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Fresh smelling shoes once again!
customer_reviews.text: I love a brand new pair of sneakers and how bright, clean and fresh smelling they are right out of the box. I wish my sneakers could smell like that after wearing them for a couple of months. Well, now I can with a little help from Kiwi Fresh Shoe Deodorizer. Pros Nice 3 pack that cleans up the odor the dirtiest smelling of sneakers Easy to understand instructions Quickly fills shoes with fresh scent Shoes smell fresher longer No more stinky odors after using this product Cons None noted
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Smells great - doesn't work on my boots
customer_reviews.text: This foot odor spray seemed like a perfect option for my smelly boots(and shoes in the summer). My combat boots get worn a lot this winter. I just got them in the beginning of December, and I always wear socks with them. The spray smells so good! I thought it would be a perfect match. I have sprayed it in my boots right after work (desk job), and they still stink when I go to wear them the next day off work. So I'm hoping they work better on canvas shoes with a different type of material for the foot bed. I'll find out in spring.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: KIWI Fresh Shoe Deodorizer, 2.2 oz (3 Aerosol Sprays) is such a great design. I never saw anything like this before. Works great. You put it in your shoe and twist open then press down and the spray goes inside the shoe, sneaker, boot, ect...delivering a deodorizer spray that leaves it smelling nice. I dont have the problem of smelly shoes but I do like them to smell fresh. This adds a nice touch. I like the scent and the design of the product. Really great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kortick

customer_reviews.title: works very well eliminating odor
customer_reviews.text: using it on our sneakers and our slip on boat shoes. Works great! I think the design is inventive and intuitive! I just read the directions on the back of the can, turned the nozzle - the white part - to the left, put it in the shoe, about in the middle and push down. Couldn't be easier and we both like the smell, it's like fresh laundry. We prefer this scent to other products we have tried. No more stinky shoes!
customer_reviews.author: J. Weber

customer_reviews.title: CONVENIENT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe deodorizer is perfect for regularly worn shoes that need refreshed. The scent is very pleasant and long-lasting! The convenience of the applicator is ingenious. No more struggling to try to get an aerosol can in just the right position to effective deodorize the inside of a shoe. Thank you Kiwi for simplifying the process of keeping shoes fresh!
customer_reviews.author: NayNay Roth

customer_reviews.title: KIWI Sneaker Deodorizer
customer_reviews.text: If you have a teen there is about a 99% change that you have stinky sneakers. This product is the perfect solution. The design makes it easy to just put the container into the shoe and press the button. The three pack is convenient to keep one in you locker, one in your gym bag, your closet or wherever you need it.
customer_reviews.author: xkydivr

customer_reviews.title: No more Stinky Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this with my work shoes as i am running around all the time. I have to say they help my not have horrible smelling shoes when i come in. They smell decent and get rid of any odor - which of course is the point.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to unstink!
customer_reviews.text: I love the style of these. Normally I'm fighting with deodorizing powder. This spray makes it easy for me. No more hassel, no more stinky shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Trebeca

customer_reviews.title: Manly scent!
customer_reviews.text: The three areas to rate this include “scent, easy to use, and warmth”. I’m not sure what the warmth is all about. Anyway, this deodorizes my shoes well, I work in a hospital and walk around in sneakers all day with my feet sweating...so they tend to stink. A 1-second blast is all ya need. It’s a manly kind of scent. The 3 pack should last a while. I’m on the 1st canister and have used it 4x/week for maybe 2 months already. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Auchter

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: fabulous-easy to use-great design to spray the whole shoe in one pass
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Has a nice smell
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Makes my shoes not smell so bad. It has a great smell to it. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Without the Perfume
customer_reviews.text: I'm lucky, in that my husband doesn't typically have a massive foot odor issue. However, once his shoes begin to get some age to them, they become a little less desirable to smell (and that, in turn, impacts his socks). We've tried different remedies for the shoes that can't simply be tossed in the washer. These KIWI sprayers help so much! You simply turn them upside down into the opening of the shoe and give it a squirt. This leaves your shoes smelling much fresher but doesn't have a gross perfume scent to it. If you are an athlete, in particular, these would be fantastic to have!
customer_reviews.author: ReviewToaKill

customer_reviews.title: Good For Stinky Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've never seen anything like this before but I like it. I don't have stinky feet, but my daughter runs on her High School track team and has stinky feet. Actually both my kids have stinky feet and therefore their shoes stink. This is a nice way to mask/maybe eliminate the stench. I can periodically wash their tennis shoes and get the stink out of them but not their leather shoes. This KIWI Fresh Shoe deodorizer is easy to use and seems to do a good job. They each have been given one and know to use it their shoes when they begin to stink.
customer_reviews.author: loveguitar

customer_reviews.title: Potent, easy to use, lasts a long while
customer_reviews.text: This is a rather potent deodorizer that works well and lasts long in most closed toed shoes. It is simple to use, just twist, press and you are done. A small blast will mask and control odors for more than a week. The price point here is good too. My only quibble with this product is that if you are sensitive to scents, this will be too much for most of you. The hubby is fine with it in his shoes, I would be miserable using it in mine. Recommended with above reservations.
customer_reviews.author: C. Klaassen

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use design!
customer_reviews.text: We have previously used some DrScholls shoe spray, but this is so much easier to use. The design really gets the full shoe easily, no problems spraying at all angles. You literally push the canister into the shoe and the pressure from the bottom of your shoe sets it to spray front and back. Genius design! Super helpful and easy to use for elderly and disabled folks too!
customer_reviews.author: Rabidus Matris

customer_reviews.title: Could smell better
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting that this would have a better smell. However, it does smell better than shoes. Very easy to use just push it in the shoes and the spray is in the shoe. The smell lasts for a long time at least for 12 + hours. I would definitely recommend using it after some time of taking off the shoes otherwise the smell gets mixed up and it smells worse. I like the fact of how the spray is designed and can spray a lot of shoes. I definitely would ask the creator to manufacture with different smells.
customer_reviews.author: Ritesh Shrestha

customer_reviews.title: Especially great for boots!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this KIWI Fresh Shoe Deodorizer, 2.2 oz (3 Aerosol Sprays) my highest rating. 5 Stars. I love the one push operation. So simple to use. "Never have to guess" dispenser. Perfect for boots. Just place the KIWI into the shoe or boot and push down. Nothing awkward about trying to get the spray in the right direction. Only press down when you have the KIWI in the shoe! A preset amount is easily dispensed into the shoe. Could not be easier and the scent is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Old Coast Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far seems good
customer_reviews.text: I've used "On Your Toes" for years, and love it. The downside is that it's a powder, so you get it on your socks, then eventually the carpet, etc... This is far, far easier to apply. Insert into shoe, squirt. I don't know what the longevity of it is going to be yet, but it seems effective on my tennis shoes so far. And this design is nice, definitely the EASIEST application I've ever seen for a shoe deodorant product.
customer_reviews.author: LegoDad

customer_reviews.title: Interesting approach to shoe deodorizing!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was a bit surprised at how the can looked. I was expecting a conventional sprayer that you just pointed into the shoes and sprayed but that is not how this KIWI deodorizer is made. It is actually better than a conventional sprayer because almost all of the spray will be inside the show. Just turn the nozzle to expose the spray heads, put the bigger opening toward the front of the shoe and push down. Now your shoe will smell nice for quite awhile.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. ROBBINS

customer_reviews.title: Great way to leave your stinky sneakers or shoes fresh
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy this is to spray into my kids stinky shoes. The lid is just a half a turn and press down inside the shoe and it sprays a generous spray of deodorizer spay inside the shoe. The spray neutralizes the smell inside the shoes leaving them smelling fresh and clean. When not in use, just give the head a half a turn and it puts the spray in a safety position.
customer_reviews.author: LoveBooks

customer_reviews.title: Shoe Deodorizer
customer_reviews.text: These are great deodorizers which are designed for tennis shoes or boots. I've read where some people didn't know how to use them for sandals, etc and I scratch my head not understanding why you'd even try that. With a dual-end applicator, it has to be a closed-in shoe. It works easy, smells fine and simply works. What more could you want?
customer_reviews.author: DTP

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is meant to do
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with how well-scented these are. The scent is not overwhelming and is quite pleasant. Once spraying this inside my husbands shoes after a full day at Disney in the heat, his shoes had no unpleasant odor. These are also very easy to use - just aim and spray. These do what they are designed to do and do well. We are pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Vance

customer_reviews.title: Deodorizing boosts
customer_reviews.text: Our shoes are right by the front door and this has made a world of difference in seconds. In between washing shoes and replacing insoles this keeps shoes fresher for longer. The design and operation of these is super simple. Twist open, press down, kills odors. Now they just need this in a super size!!
customer_reviews.author: Moises Garcia Landeros

customer_reviews.title: Brillant spray propulsion
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest product, literally. Takes stinky hot shoes & makes them cool and fresh. Plus you insert the base in your shoes so when you spray, it shoots forward and back, In. The. Shoe, not in the air. No more inhaling spray residue. Or having to change the cat's water bc spray landed everywhere. Thank you Kiwi.
customer_reviews.author: J&J

customer_reviews.title: Works well and easy to use but smells very strong
customer_reviews.text: This shoe deodorizer is super easy to use. It removes the unpleasant scent your shoes start of with and leaves them with a nice and refreshing scent that is much better to deal with. It takes seconds to use this and the smell last a long time. It is very strong and for some shoes this is well needed, which is probably why they made this shoe deodorizer that way.
customer_reviews.author: MonasZoo

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use, great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is very easy to use, maybe you have to apply a little more force than expected, but shoot the spray for the front and back of the shoe, and effectively eliminates bad odors. It remains to be seen how many times it can be used before emptying it, in my case it should last a long time because I only use it in 1 pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Nice odor controller for shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are nice deodorizers for shoes, slippers, etc. The dual spout design makes sure that it gets into every area of the shoe, but it also means you'll get a bunch on your hands when you use it. But that's not a big deal. It works decently. The effects don't last super long, but it does help.
customer_reviews.author: Psychic Cypher

customer_reviews.title: Great product design!
customer_reviews.text: I really love the design of these - you turn the bottom, then press down into your shoe. It sprays into your shoe, with no spray anywhere else. Very easy to use and no mess. The scent is light and clean, and it is working well for my stinky tennis shoes!!
customer_reviews.author: 🌟 Emma Elizabeth 🌟

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are a life saver, especially if you have pre teens with extremely stinky feet, which I do, they also work great leaving them in a gym bag and helping with that smell. I would definitely recommend as they are great for any kind of kids sports bag
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn

customer_reviews.title: Deodorizer
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how easy this product is to use. Just turn the cap to lock into place and press down. The spray actually comes out quicker and heavier than I presumed, but it works really well. The aroma is pleasant and dries pretty quick.
customer_reviews.author: DTP

customer_reviews.title: Effective on icky, wet, kid sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: This spray is amazing. I was impressed by how effective it was on my 8 year old's gross sneakers that had developed quite the funk over the fall and winter. One treatment made them not stink up the room! I will definitely keep using this!
customer_reviews.author: CCE

product_meta.title: KIWI Sneaker Deodorizer Shoe Odor Spray, 2.2 oz (3 Aerosol Sprays)
product_meta.description: Style:Sneaker Protector (3 Pack)KIWI Sneaker Deodorizer is Step 3 of the 3-Step KIWI Sneaker Care system. Keep your pride fresh with KIWI Sneaker Deodorizer. It is a powerful shoe odor spray that keeps your shoes smelling as fresh as they look. Control the odor all day with convenient two-sided spraying that is suitable for Full Grain and Patent Leather, Synthetic and Faux Leather, Canvas, Suede, Nubuck, Mesh, Nylon and Fabric. Your shoes don't have to be new to smell new.
feature_bullets: KIWI Sneaker Deodorizer is a powerful shoe odor spray that keeps shoes smelling fresh throughout the day
Shoe spray controls odors with a convenient two-sided spray bottle that has a clean, refreshing scent
Suitable for Full Grain and Patent Leather, Synthetic and Faux Leather, Canvas, Suede, Nubuck, Mesh, Nylon and Fabric
Step 3 of the 3-Step KIWI Sneaker Care system
